name: Short Fuse (itch) (Dynamite Stew, pretentiouslemon, JamminmanZ, Mouse, Faesu, Can Top, CWeed420, ColinKetcham, Wolfenrahd, SquishyTurtleGames, Curdle Games, Danial Jumagaliyev, JNH, swagshaw, Sonicboomcolt)
name_original: Short Fuse (itch) (Dynamite Stew, pretentiouslemon, JamminmanZ, Mouse, Faesu, Can Top, CWeed420, ColinKetcham, Wolfenrahd, SquishyTurtleGames, Curdle Games, Danial Jumagaliyev, JNH, swagshaw, Sonicboomcolt)
description:
Ladies and Gentlemen, welcome to Short Fuse!

Made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam

________

Team-up online or locally with the living bombs, Booma and Blamma! They are abducted by game show host, Toilet Paper Man, and made to compete in an arena where fire and guns are rampant. Navigate Booma and Blamma combined fuse to deflect bullets! 

But watch out, it could be a combustible affair...

________ 

Post-Jam Note

Future development on this project is already intended! Therefore, we are really looking for your awesome feedback, to get out an even more polished version for you.

TEAM CREDITS:

 Sonicboomcolt - Networking Expert / Programmer 

Curdle - Pixel Artist / Programmer / Director 

JNH - Game Design 

Dan - Networking Expert / Programming 

Squishy - Programming / Pixel Art 

Alex / Cweed420 - Music / Sound Design 

Faesu - Pixel Art / Animation 

MagicMouse - Pixel Art / Animation 

Can Top - Sound Design / FMOD Implementation

Colin - Sound Design / FMOD Implementation

Jazz - Pixel Art / Animation

OLV - Sound Design 

Wolfenrahd - Sound Design 

Swagshaw - Director / Team Organizer
